*div1 type="summary"* *p*Humphry Jackson to Austin, January 6, 1825. Judicial procedure. Roads and improvements.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dr. Sir*/p*
*p*Agreeable to your [request] of the *date_mentioned n="12-22-1824">22. of Decr*/date_mentioned* I Cald on *person_mentioned*Mr Lynch*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Scott*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Straing*/person_mentioned* and finding it would be the saim difficulty as before owing to the Pertinaciousness of *person_mentioned*Lynch*/person_mentioned* I named 6 Men and alowed him to object to any he did not like the other Two agreed to the saim men we appointed the *date_mentioned n="01-01-1825">1st of Janry*/date_mentioned* to Meet *person_mentioned*Mr Hughs*/person_mentioned* and Two of the *person_mentioned*Arbitrators */person_mentioned*not appiering*person_mentioned* Mr L*/person_mentioned* wanted to appoint another day he not greeing to name any Two that was present we proceded to lay of the *location_mentioned*Labor */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr L*/person_mentioned*] Cald in *person_mentioned*John Taylor*/person_mentioned* to prove Conditional Lines between *person_mentioned*Straing*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Scoot */person_mentioned*it also appierd that *person_mentioned*Lynch*/person_mentioned* extend his claim at different times it was since a falling out betwen him and *person_mentioned*Straing*/person_mentioned* that he Claimed the spot he was contending for *person_mentioned*Straing*/person_mentioned* setled by Consent of parties inclosed you have a copy of the decision which in my oppinion is a Just one and have don equal Justice to all parties—I with pleasure inform you this is the first business of any consequence I have don as *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned* and is in hopes that my time of service will expire more agreable than I expected—I wish to call your attention to setting a *location_mentioned*permanent ferry */location_mentioned*on the *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*Mouth of Buflow Byo*/location_mentioned* we laibour under a grait disadvantage at present It is the most *location_mentioned*central place*/location_mentioned* to do business in this district and I expect the *location_mentioned*main thoroughfare rode*/location_mentioned* will be this way I thinck it ought not to be left at the will of those who taick it in their tract of land and live at a distance I have been thinking of several wais such as laíng a Labore or reserveing a place for a Town you are the best Judge I know of no person wishing to settle there but am certain [there would be some if some] regulations wair made. There has been some taulck of cuting a road from *location_mentioned*Bufflow B*/location_mentioned* and crossing the *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* at my House it would be much the shorter and perhaps the best but I thinck we have better spend our time in raising Corn as yet*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Humphry Jackson*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="01-06-1825">Janry 6 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Corl. Steven F Austin*/person_mentioned* Chief of *location_mentioned*Austin Colony*/location_mentioned* Excuse the smallness of this paper I have got very little and can not procure any here*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*HJ*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
